Author: crazyscranton
Text: that’s a good idea - I definitely think it would be better if I could weigh myself a couple of times a month instead of every day, but it’s so hard for me to put my scale away and have no clue what my body is doing!   I’ll definitely give it a go though, for the sake of not having my mood absolutely ruined when the scale goes up instead of down :)

Author: Duskyroses
Text: Maybe you could avoid weighing yourself for a bit? I’m almost always disappointed when I do because I either gained or what was lost was like 1 pound and I can feel like, “Wow, my deficit is 1,500 and I’m still losing at a rate of a normal person having a deficit of 500.”  If I wait to weigh myself every couple of weeks though I’m always way more pleased.
